author: Adrian Collins
description:
2025 was an absolute banger of a year for fantasy, sci-fi, and horror book releases that should appeal to fans of grimdark. 2026 is absolutely no different. My head is actually hurting trying to figure out how I’m going to read everything I want to read this year. It’s a bloody great problem to have. […]

title: 2026 most anticipated fantasy, sci-fi, and horror book releases
